REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1353 reute r f BC-AUTOSPA-<LUBE>-TO-RED 04-08 0041

TEXT.TITLE: AUTOSPA <LUBE> TO REDEEM WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: AutoSpa corp said it will redeem all its common stock purchase warrants on May Five at 7.5 cts each. Through May Four, each warrant may be exercised into one common share at 1.75 dlrs. Reuter
